name: Pudding Milkshake
description: Get your blender revved up! Ice cream and pudding are besties, so when they hang out, it can only mean something good. The Instant Pudding Mix thickens the shake for optimal, velvety smoothness and satisfaction. This recipe makes a big batch, so spread the sweet joy at your next party.

ingredients.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix or Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix

preparation: In a blender, add pudding mix, milk, and ice cream. Cover and blend until smooth, about 30 sec. For a thicker consistency, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add more milk.
Pour into 12 tall glasses and top with whipped cream, if desired. Serve immediately.
